ModMetaData.name: FactionDefs Extended
ModMetaData.author: dninemfive
ModMetaData.description: A framework exposing several fields which could not formerly be controlled in FactionDefs, PawnKindDefs, and a few miscellaneous other files. Right now, you can control gender distribution, body types, and a few more appearance features.\n\nFuture plans include a uniform system and a way of controlling faction relations.
